transcript:
these are three tips to help you with
your anxiety number one don't look at
your phone for at least an hour after
you wake up in an hour before you go to
bed that thing in your pocket can be the
main culprit to your anxiety number two
don't eat any food that comes in a box
or a bag processed foods are high in
sugar preservatives and food coloring
all can cause massive spikes and drops
in your blood sugar and number three
stop drinking caffeine for the next
seven days and see how you feel although
a few things in this world are better
than a cup of coffee in the morning
caffeine can induce your anxiety
symptoms or make them worse
